availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Silas S. Snodgrass (Richland County, IL, witness)

body.p: Richland County, Illinois, resident. Ohio native. Son of George Snodgrass and Hannah Snodgrass. Married to Nancy Judy Snodgrass in Union County, Ohio, on February 24, 1857. Laborer in Union County, Ohio, in 1850. Resident of Lawrence County, Illinois, in 1860. Witness to the jury in the indictment of Arch Means et al. for kidnapping in Richland County, Illinois, in November 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Union County, Marysville, p. 41B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Lawrence County, Petty, p. 83.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Union County Marriages, Film 000573777, p. 79. "Silas Snodgrass (1829-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial 32892993, accessed March 30, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32892993.
